mission: Every time you kill a player, do 10 push ups immediately.
Every time your team kills a player, do 5 push ups immediately.
Every time your enemy team kills a player, do 5 push ups immediately.
If spike has been planted, then do 20 jumping jacks immediately.
Stay at your spawn for 1 minute.
Go to your enemy's spawn without killing them. Once you get there, began fighting.
Every time your enemy team uses all chat, pause what you're doing and reply immediately.
If you're not top fragging, then every time your team gets a kill, apologize for not top fragging.
Turn off your sound -- comms are allowed -- for this round.
Turn off your sound, including your comms, for this round.
When you shoot, you must always right click to aim.
If you kill a player, pick up their gun to shoot. Until then, you cannot shoot.
Knife a player.
Hey! Your agent wants a rest! No running -- only walking!
Give wrong comms 5 times to your teammates.
Every time you kill a player, t-bag him 5 times.
Pile up 4 guns from dead players in one spot.
Stay right behind your bottom fragger and imitiate his every move.
No crosshair for this round.
You can only move with your knife out.
You must press your W key the entire round.
Every time you encounter an enemy, do a 360 turn before you shoot.
Appoint one player as your President. Now, protect him with all your life. If President dies, then you must too.
You cannot use your abilities -- nothing!
You cannot comm this round.
Rebind your movement keys: W means backward. S means forward. A means right. D means left.
You cannot reload your gun. You can, however, switch guns.
Stay in your spawn until spike has been planted.

If you shoot before spike has been planted, you cannot shoot after spike has been planted. On the other hand, if you don't shoot before spike has been planted, you can shoot after spike has been planted.
Play on max mouse sensitivity. How to Change Mouse Sensitivity: Settings -> General -> Mouse -> Sensitivity: Aim
Play on the lowest mouse sensitivity. How to Change Mouse Sensitivity: Settings -> General -> Mouse -> Sensitivity: Aim
You can only use your 'W' key for movement.
You must be scoping at all times.
You're the bait! Bait yourself and have your team trade you for a kill!
Every time you get a kill, spray paint on the dead body. You cannot shoot until you do so.
Play with Inverted Mouse On. How to Turn on Inverted Mouse: Settings -> General -> Mouse -> Invert Mouse: On
You must use all of your pistol bullets before using your main weapon. You cannot shoot your pistol during Buy Phase.
You need to be healthy! Stand up while playing this round.
Your chair needs a rest from your butt! Get off your chair, and then sit down on the floor while playing this round.
Your right hand will control your keyboard. And your left hand will control your mouse.
You must prefire all corners.
You can only use 'A' and 'D' keys to move.
You can only use your index finger for the keyboard.
When the round starts, quickly go touch grass (yes, I mean real green grass), and then come back and play. No grass? Go touch a plant. No plants? Go touch a vegetable.
